title: You Might as Well Die
description: When second-rate illustrator Ernie MacGuffin's artistic works triple in value following his apparent suicide off the Brooklyn Bridge, Dorothy Parker smells something fishy. Enlisting the help of magician and skeptic Harry Houdini, she goes to a s√©ance held by MacGuffin's mistress, where Ernie's ghostly voice seems hauntingly real...
author: J.J. Murphy
